All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlaysTest  
    Ball
    Enum class for all possible in-game balls.
    BallTest  
    Client
    This class contains the client used by users who want to connect to a server and play a game.
    ClientController
    This class is being used for controlling the Client and consists of a handler of all user inputs.
    ClientControllerTest  
    ClientTest  
    ClientTest  
    Colour
    This class is made for text colouring and consists of string of colour codes and methods to set the colour of a string.
    ColourTest  
    ComputerPlayer
    This class contains a beginner and an intermediate AI which can play Collecto instead of a regular user.
    ComputerPlayerTest  
    Controller
    This class is a basic controller which can prompt the user for regular input, a port or an IP address.
    ControllerTest  
    Game
    This class contains the implementation of a game of Collecto.
    GameTest  
    Global
    This class contains methods, classes and a delimiter, which are used by multiple other methods.
    Global.Protocol
    This class contains classes holding strings that are used often in the entirety of the Collecto program, as well as the TYPE_HELP string which contains a statement referring to the help menu in clients.
    Global.Protocol.Commands
    This class contains simple commands to be used by clients to check for input from their users.
    Global.Protocol.Extensions
    This class contains strings for the possible extensions that a server or client can have.
    Global.Protocol.Misc
    This class contains some miscellaneous commands to be used by clients and servers to compare to outside input.
    Global.Protocol.Win
    This class contains strings of reasons for winning a game.
    GlobalTest  
    GridBoard
    This class contains the actual game board and handles all operations made on its attributes.
    GridBoardTest  
    IntegrationTest  
    Misc  
    Move
    This class stores and implements moves.
    Move.Direction
    Enum of all possible directions of a Move.
    MoveTest  
    Player
    This class represents a player of the game, it stores the name of the player and tracks all the balls which have been earned while playing a game.
    PlayerHandler
    This class handles clients that connect to a server.
    PlayerHandlerTest  
    PlayerTest  
    Server
    This class contains the server to which clients can connect to play games against each other.
    SocketFactory  
    TUI
    This class contains the Textual User Interface used by all other classes in the Collecto program to print anything on the screen of a user.
    TUITest
